passages.text:
Are you here to return my shovel?
[[What?|what]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
My shovel! It's gone, I need it, and you were the last person here before it went missing! Well, you and my son. Where is it?
[[I didn't take it, but I might know who did.|Know who]]
[[Are you sure your son didn't take it?|Son take it]]

links.name: I didn't take it, but I might know who did.|Know who
links.link: I didn't take it, but I might know who did.|Know who

links.name: Are you sure your son didn't take it?|Son take it
links.link: Are you sure your son didn't take it?|Son take it

passages.name: what

passages.text:
You're dumber than a fish on a hook. Why would he do that?! He's got his own dang shovel, and besides, that boy hasn't willingly done any manual labor since he the day he was born. He'd rather eat worms than help me dig 'em up. What would he need my shovel for?
[[Maybe he was burying something.|Son burying]]
[[Maybe he was searching for something buried underground.|Digging]]

links.name: Maybe he was burying something.|Son burying
links.link: Maybe he was burying something.|Son burying

links.name: Maybe he was searching for something buried underground.|Digging
links.link: Maybe he was searching for something buried underground.|Digging

passages.name: Son take it

passages.text:
Are you deaf? I just told you, he ain't got no reason to do such a thing! There's nothing under this soil worth looking for anyway, just worms and decay.
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Digging

passages.text: Now, if you don't have my shovel, I don't see no need to continue this conversation. Good day.
passages.name: Bye

passages.text:
Whatever you think you may have seen don't mean nothin', ya hear? You don't understand our ways. You don't know what it takes to live out in a place like this. So don't go sticking your nose where it doesn't belong.
[[Bye]]
passages.name: continue2

passages.text:
Now, I know he ain't doin' that. That job ain't for him.
[[continue3]]
passages.name: Son burying

passages.text:
Yeah? And who would that be?
[[I think the other stranger took it.|New girl]]
[[I saw a girl digging behind the church.|Church]]

links.name: I think the other stranger took it.|New girl
links.link: I think the other stranger took it.|New girl

links.name: I saw a girl digging behind the church.|Church
links.link: I saw a girl digging behind the church.|Church

passages.name: Know who

passages.text:
The writer? Dagnabbit, I knew from the moment she stepped foot here that she would be trouble. I bet she took it so she could snoop around and stick her nose further into our business... Someone needs to make her understand the importance of boundaries. This town don't take kindly to thieves... or busybodies.
[[Bye]]
passages.name: New girl

passages.text:
I'm sure you have no idea what you're talking about.
[[continue]]
passages.name: Church
